Steps.Message: Update at 18:54 - Our engineers are still on their way and are due to arrive on site very soon but due to the delay of their arrival, we've had to make a change to the timeframe. We're now estimating to have the power restored between 23:30 and 00:30. We're sorry this is taking longer than expected. We will stay in touch with our engineers and keep you updated on their progress. If you have a vulnerable person at home, please call us on 08003163105 and we'll see if we can provide any additional support.

We became aware of a power cut at 14:35. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Logs.Comment: Update at 18:54 - Our engineers are still on their way and are due to arrive on site very soon but due to the delay of their arrival, we've had to make a change to the timeframe. We're now estimating to have the power restored between 23:30 and 00:30. We're sorry this is taking longer than expected. We will stay in touch with our engineers and keep you updated on their progress. If you have a vulnerable person at home, please call us on 08003163105 and we'll see if we can provide any additional support.

UKPNIncident.PlannedIncidentReason: We're carrying out planned work in your area. For our engineers to carry it out safely they need to turn the power off. We're doing this work as it's essential to provide reliable electricity supplies to your area. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
